resources.string: No internet connection. Please check your network settings and try again.
The requested resource was not found
Something went wrong on the server. Please try again later.
You are not authorized to perform this action. Please log in and try again.
You do not have permission to access this resource.
You\'ve sent too many request in a short period please wait a while before retrying.
Service Unavailable — We\'re temporarily offline for maintenance. Please try again later.
Too Many Requests — You\'re rate limited.
Not Acceptable — You requested a format that isn\'t json.
The request was canceled. Please try again.
Received an unexpected response from the server. Please try again later.
